roleset.name: warning
roleset.note: PRECAUTION-N NOTES: Comparison to warn.01 (from precaution.01-n)

example.name: precaution-n: Arg0,1
example.text: Notwithstanding Columbus' precaution to keep the people ignorant of the distance they had sailed, they were now growing extremely uneasy at the length of the voyage.
example.arg: to keep the people ignorant of the distance they had sailed
